Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Students who don't know they're career plans but want to get Gen Eds done at a fraction of the cost.
Skokie campus' second floor library, you can get a lot of studying done.
Best option for students not trying to get into debt!
Intramural basketball, spanish club, and being part of the student government.
EXPENSIVE!! But there are no other places near!
Some classes are just like lecture classes at big universities, however some classes remain small and the teachers are active with students.
Don't be afraid to get involved with oakton students/staff! Talk to your teachers, they are humans like everyone else and at Oakton they are way more down to earth!
Great community college with even better staff that are only after you best interest. The school is close and has two campuses and offers a lot to students willing to emerge themselves in the school.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here It's hard to socialize here because everyone has their own cliques from high school... Actually it feels like I'm still in high school sometimes, but for the most part people here are very agreeable and polite. Also, amazing burgers hahaha. Am learning a lot Though some of the general education courses can become tedious, some teacher profoundly want you to walk away with at least a new grain of knowledge by the end of their lecture. Courses like World Mythology and General Physics are great to take if you're curious on how the world works behind the scenes.
